evidence.claim: Hifinite Health employs AWS services like Lambda and S3 for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards which is critical for health data security.
They implement FHIR APIs for health data interoperability as mentioned in their developer documentation.
Hifinite Health provides integration patterns that are API-first and event-driven enhancing scalability.

icp.icp_reason: Hifinite Health uses X12 transactions and offers API-first integration for healthcare data exchange.
